content.rendered:
Upgraded Single Vision Lens for Optimised Vision

Seto Arex is the perfect prescription product in digital single vision lenses offering crisp, spot-on optics. Using the best of the virtual lens era, your prescription lenses are crafted with utmost precision. Just what the doctor prescribed!

Seto Arex can be embellished with a range of top of the line Lustraa coating offerings. Choose the Lustraa coating that best serves your need and keep enhancing the level of protection for your precious lenses.

HD • UV+ • Blue+ • IR+ • DrivEase • FogFree


Features



  • Perfect single vision lenses offering spot-on optics
  • High visual acuity
  • Optimised performance
  • Scratch resistant
  • Option of 6 Lustraa coatings


Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses
